Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style or Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; part of rosette with alternating added red and added white petals; trace of white outline of lotus flower; exterior: part of elaborate rosette as filling ornament.
Curator's comments: On Mature Animal Style chalices, the elaborate rosette is used as filling ornament. On Chalice Style chalices, it is placed in between confronting creatures.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0693) (phase 2)
